descriptions:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide a correct experimental technique.

  • Test the conductivity of the solution (the solution would conduct electricity if ions are present).

    OR

  • Evaporate the water from the filtrate to leave solid crystals.

The response provides a correct experimental technique (justification not required).

  • Test the conductivity of the solution (the solution would conduct electricity if ions are present).

    OR

  • Evaporate the water from the filtrate to leave solid crystals.
